entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is the main character in this scene. He gasped and gulped before looking up into the cracked mirror and saw Harry staring at him over his shoulder.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the other main character in this scene. He instinctively pulled out his wand when Malfoy drew his, and they began to cast spells at each other.

entities.name: moaning myrtle
entities.description: Moaning Myrtle is a character who appears in the scene. She screams loudly when Harry's Leg-Locker Curse backfires and smashes the cistern beneath her.

relationships.description: Malfoy cast a hex at Harry, but it missed him by inches. Harry then threw himself sideways and attempted to cast a jinx at Malfoy.
Malfoy blocked the jinx that Harry tried to cast at him, and then raised his wand for another spell. Harry attempted a Leg-Locker Curse that backfired off the wall behind Malfoy's ear.
Harry threw himself sideways and attempted to cast a jinx at Malfoy, but it was blocked. Harry then attempted a Leg-Locker Curse that backfired off the wall behind Malfoy's ear.
Malfoy's spell caused water to pour everywhere, and Moaning Myrtle screamed loudly as a result.
